abstract: A court is investigating charges that Google broke Spanish law while gathering photographs for Street View, its photo-mapping service.
snippet: A court is investigating charges that Google broke Spanish law while gathering photographs for Street View, its photo-mapping service.
lead_paragraph: MADRID  A judge in Spain opened an investigation into whether Google unlawfully collected data from unsecured wireless networks while gathering photographs for Google’s photo-mapping service Street View.

headline.main: Google Sued in Spain Over Data Collecting
headline.print_headline: Google Sued in Spain Over Data Collecting
